SERVICES CONTACT

Why Choose Us

Welcome to Washington Sanchez & Associates, LLC. We provide professional tax preparation services and accounting services at competitive and affordable rates. We guide individuals and businesses in planning their futures, and make sure their financial records are accurate. We offer tax management services, business accounting, and other financial services. Our philosophy is to help the community grow and make your needs our needs.

Bookkeeping / Payroll Services

Let us help you so you can do what you do best — run your business.

General Business Accounting

We offer sound projections and modeling activities to determine the best course of action for your growing business.

Public Notary

Need your documents notarized? We provide prompt and professional notary public services.

Tax Preparation Services

Our attention for detail and promptness ensures the best professional representation in all areas of tax compliance.

Business Logistics

Efficient coordination services to meet your business's projected requirements.
